entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HashSet<int>.CreateSetComparer implementation is not symmetric #69218
  • System.Text.Json using interpolated string with JsonSerializable.TypeInfoPropertyName fails with ArgumentException #69207
    7.0.0
  • There may be unexpectedly high delays in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` operations #69206
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten 3.1.9 ftruncate64 syscall regression #69205
    7.0.0
  • JIT perf: Span.Slice(0, ...) emits unnecessary 64-bit extensions #69200
  • The certificate that you're adding to HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates only contains the public key. The SSL connection can't happen without access to the private key. #69199
  • superpmi-diffs and superpmi-replay are running when jiteeversionguid.h changes #69197
    7.0.0
  • Backport PR failures in github action #69196
    7.0.0
  • JIT does not hoist bound check outside a loop #69194
  • NullReferenceException inside ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable #69192
  • TaskCanceledException in msbuild while building on OSX-x64 #69190
  • Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4 on Arm64 #69186
    7.0.0
  • XxHash incremental versions not processing stripe when filling holdback exactly. #69184
  • HTTP/2: High P99 latency when sending a large request body #69179
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text` property #69168
  • Client Certificate Authentication Time out after 100s On Linux #69167
  • WASM AOT compilation runs indefinitely and consumes all system memory with LanguageExt.Core #69166
    7.0.0

Closed

  • `Func<T>.MakeGenericType(typeof(ReadOnlySpan<char>))` throws `ArgumentException` in 7.0.100-preview.4 while the exception was `TypeLoadException` in prior versions #69084
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(l2 < optLoopCount) || (l2 == BasicBlock::NOT_IN_LOOP)' during 'Do value numbering' #68769
    7.0.0
  • "Handle is already used by another Socket." causing 502 errors (NET Core 2.2., NET 5.0, Kestrel, CentOS, Nginx) #56750
    7.0.0
  • Test hang: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.CreateSocket.Ctor_SafeHandle_Listening_Success #56666
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'markedLastLoop && markedCurrLoop' during 'Generate code' #65988
    7.0.0
  • File.Copy on macOS wrong escape of characters #68960
  • Assertion failed 'alignInstr->idaIG->endsWithAlignInstr()' during 'Generate code' #65690
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'paddingToAdd == paddingNeeded' in 'System.SpanTests.IndexOfAnyExceptTests`1[Byte][System.Byte]:SomeElementsDontMatch_ReturnsOffset(int,System.Int32[]):this' #68510
    7.0.0
  • Return value marshalling should not require CustomTypeMarshallerDirection.In #69086
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient failed to handle Request Entity Too Large (413) response #69048
  • [mono] Tracking: Intrinsics runtime tests #43842
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Awaitable Interfaces (implementing `GetAwaiter()`) #69183
  • Browser AOT leg failing in compilation on Regex source generator tests #60048
    7.0.0
  • aspnet core Identity not working after deployment on server #69134
  • [Mono Android] Runtime tests used more memory than Android simulator allowed #44643
    7.0.0
  • "Fatal error. Internal CLR error." when running System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Tests in CI #69181
  • [QUIC] Adopt msquic generated interop layer #67377
    7.0.0
  • failfast in native code invoked by MsQuicStream.Dispose in CI #68954
  • Support blittable type marshalling without `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` #69033
    7.0.0
  • Build break on ijw host and generic maths interfaces #69174
  • Possible Assert when disposing SslStream during transfer/handshake #66818
    7.0.0
  • Current state of Blazor WebAssembly and the Firefox Debugger #52698
    Future
  • `LibraryImport` source generator test project fails to build in VS #69064
  • Add validation / emit errors when ref configurations contain RIDs #29154
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Breaks from nested loops #69175
  • Getting error on windows => System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.IO.Ports is currently only supported on Windows.' #25375
    7.0.0
  • JIT: libraries PGO assert during Find Loops #69032
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Extract the main run loop from DevToolsClient, and #69219
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add comment about PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(0) #69217
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Fix message about missing constructor for CallerAllocatedBuffer support #69216
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Pull out some common code snippets for custom struct marshalling tests #69215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Fix handling of custom type marshaller pinning with a different type than the native type. #69214
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add `BStrStringMarshaller` to source generator #69213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update to a newer Roslyn compiler #69211
  • Clear `NO_CSE` on struct addresses in `MorphCommaBlock` #69210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat `INDEX_ADDR`s as non-null #69209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fix invalid Host header for link-local IPv6 #69203
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Capture test output with xunit, so the output is cleaner, and the #69201
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Add missing (uint) cast in regex generated code #69198
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Renamed most of the Redhawk occurences to NativeAOT #69195
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Optimize Span.Slice by using IsKnownConstant for start = 0 #69193
    area-System.Runtime, optimization
  • [wasm-mt] Fix references in `System.Threading.ThreadPool.WebAssembly.Threading` #69191
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix HTTP3 stress #69182
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stop running both normal and no_tiered_compilation scenarios for coreclr PRs #69178
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix issue in verify regions #69177
    area-GC-coreclr
  • I noticed some initalizations were missing… #69176
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable k-nucleotide-9 in llvmfullaot #69173
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • make sure NetworkInfo works without IPv6 on Linux #69172
    area-System.Net, os-linux
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize Nil PublicKeyToken to an empty array #69169
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reset the bbNatLoopNum of block for removed loop #68804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold range checks with constant operands #69056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update perf map docs #68181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Loop alignment: Fix loop size calculation to exclude IG's size that are marked as not aligned #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix error on return value marshalling without CustomTypeMarshallerDirection.In #69189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adjust the usage of ReverseEndianness in BinaryPrimitives #69063
    area-System.Buffers, optimization, community-contribution
  • Removing comments so won't overwrite doc changes #69089
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • StringMarshaller optimizations #69035
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop (#68288)" attempt no 2 #69009
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Support strictly blittable type marshalling #69100
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Don't return SslStreamBuffer when disposing during handshake #68956
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Copy propagate on `LCL_FLD`s #68592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Error if a reference assembly is platform specific #69116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Call simpler overloads of Substring and Slice #68937
    area-Meta
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #69152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: fix issue with assert seen in OSR+PGO tests #69067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Requires on type in NativeAot #68978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • ARM64 - Do not emit possible DIV_BY_ZERO/OVERFLOW exception blocks for non-zero/non-(negative one) constants #68945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to System.Text.Json #69160
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve some use of Regex #68961
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • Define convention to consume and/or package analyzers #69069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix linker tests not running and show full path during trimming test execution #69118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • PoC: retire internal SocketExceptionFactory #68918
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Substitute GT_RET_EXPR in inline candidate arguments #69117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `impBoxPatternMatch` #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Unify SendContent cancellation between HTTP3 and HTTP2 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Deadlock mitigation for debugging #69121
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove "promoted parameter" tailcall limitation #69034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Docker fixes for the enterprise linux testing pipeline #68913
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
